titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Wyden. Without written report.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources for the 113th Congress.
